prompt.name: p215
prompt.text:
They are found by multiplying the numerator and denominator of a fraction by the same number.
e.g. #fr1# = #fr2# = #fr3#.

instruction.name: correct
instruction.text: Correct! Well done!

instruction.name: i101
instruction.text:

The next few questions will help you solve the problem.

OK to go back to the main question again!

instruction.name: i111

Use '/' to write in fractions.

instruction.text: Make the denominator #deno# in both the fractions.

instruction.name: i114
instruction.text: Please fill colour in the rectangle!!

instruction.name: i115
instruction.text:
#question1# is #num1# out of #deno1# equal parts!
So we need to shade #num1# parts here.

instruction.name: i115a
instruction.text:
#question1# is #num1# out of #deno1# equal parts!

instruction.name: i116
instruction.text:

So we need to shade #num2# parts here.

instruction.name: i116a
instruction.text:
#question2# is #num2# out of #deno2# equal parts!
So we need to shade #num2# part here.

instruction.name: i117
instruction.text:
#selected# is #total1# out of #total2# equal parts!
So we need to shade #total1# parts here.

misc.name: enter
misc.text: Press enter to submit the answer.
